def is_remote_control_visible(place:item):
    # Function to check if the remote control is visible at a specified place
    symbol visible=exists remote: item : is_remote_control(remote) and on(remote, place)
    return visible

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        if exists place: item : is_table(place) and is_remote_control_visible(place):
            # If the remote control is already visible on a table, approach it
            bind table: item where:
                is_table(table) and is_remote_control_visible(table)
            achieve close_char(char, table)

        else:
            # Check all unvisited places where the remote control could be
            foreach place: item:
                if (is_table(place) or is_couch(place) or is_tvstand(place)) and not visited(place):
                    observe(place, "Check if the remote control is on or around this place")

behavior turn_on_dvd_player(remote_control:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control)
        # Ensure you are near the remote control
        achieve close_char(char, dvd_player)
        # Ensure you are near the DVD player
        achieve is_on(dvd_player)
        # Ensure the DVD player is turned on

            is_remote_control(remote_control)
        # Select the remote control
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
        # Select the DVD player

        # Execute the behavior to turn on the DVD player with the remote control

def in_home_office(remote:item):
    # Function to check if the remote is in the home office
    symbol in_home_office=exists room: item : is_home_office(room) and inside(remote, room)
    return in_home_office

behavior turn_on_dvd_player(remote:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        achieve_once inhand(remote) # Temporarily hold the remote control
        achieve is_on(dvd_player) # Turn on the DVD player

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote) and id[remote]==2052
        # Select the remote control with ID 2052
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player) and id[dvd_player]==2061

bservations

        turn_on_dvd_player(remote, dvd_player) # Use the remote to turn on the DVD player

        # Ensure the character is close to the DVD player

behavior use_remote_to_turn_on_dvd(remote_control:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        achieve close_char(char, remote_control)
        # Move closer to the remote control, if not already close

        if not visited(remote_control):
            observe(remote_control, "How to operate the remote control")
            # Observe the remote control to understand how to operate it

        achieve is_on(dvd_player)
        # Turn on the DVD player using the remote control

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)
            # Bind the remote control instance

        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
            # Bind the DVD player instance

        use_remote_to_turn_on_dvd(remote_control, dvd_player)
        # Use the remote to turn on the DVD player

def has_switch_and_close(remote_control:item, dvd_player:item):
    # Determine if the remote control has a switch and is close to the DVD player
    return has_switch(remote_control) and close(remote_control, dvd_player)

behavior turn_on_dvd(dvd_player:item, remote_control:item):
    body:
        achieve is_on(dvd_player)  # The DVD player should be on

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player) and id[dvd_player]==2061
        # Choose the dvd_player with ID 2061
        
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and id[remote_control]==2052
        # Choose the remote_control with ID 2052
        
        if has_switch_and_close(remote_control, dvd_player):
            turn_on_dvd(dvd_player, remote_control)
        else:
            if not visited(remote_control):
                observe(remote_control,"Check if the remote control is functional and near the dvd p
layer")

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control)
        
        if not (close(remote_control, dvd_player) and has_switch(remote_control) and not is_on(dvd_p
layer)):
            achieve close_char(char, remote_control)
            achieve close(remote_control, dvd_player)
        
        observe(remote_control, "Confirm if it is functional and has a switch")
        
        if is_off(dvd_player):
            achieve is_on(dvd_player)

behavior use_remote_control(remote_control:item, dvd_player:item):
    body:
        if not is_on(remote_control):
            achieve_once is_on(remote_control) # ensure the remote control is turned on
            
        achieve has_switch(remote_control) # verify the remote control has a switch
        achieve close(remote_control, dvd_player) # make sure the remote control is close to the DVD
 player
        achieve_once is_on(dvd_player)  # use the remote to turn on the DVD player

behavior __goal__():

        bind remote_control: item where:
            is_remote_control(remote_control) and close_char(char, remote_control)
        bind dvd_player: item where:
            is_dvd_player(dvd_player)
        
        use_remote_control(remote_control, dvd_player)
